name: Reptilian
description: Hail Draconis is a platform-spanning Reptilian propaganda project celebrating the misadventures of Earth’s shadowy cabal of shapeshifting overlords across animated episodes, comics, NFT collections and a participatory storyworld. The dark energy powering the Hail Draconis Metaverse is $RPTC, a one-of-a-kind entertainment coin unlocking hodler access to exclusive NFT rewards, interaction with the series, and protection from blood sacrifice. Forget crypto, here’s repto, baby. The Unholy Tarot predicts the great flippening between $RPTC and $DOGE
